Key Match Events: The Mets came alive in the eighth inning, leading to a crushing loss for the Phillies.
Pre-Game Insights: Fans were hopeful and confident in the Phillies, with one fan saying 'You can never count us out'.
Post-Match Reflections: Fans are not panicking and are instead focusing on the team bouncing back and their bats coming alive.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fans are planning a block party for Sunday at 1 p.m. and will receive rally towels at the gates for Game 2.
Others: The team will give away rally towels at the gates for Game 2, and the first pitch is set for 4:08 p.m.
